Module org.example.eiscuno
Package org.example.eiscuno.model.planeTextFiles

Interface IPlaneTextFileHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
PlaneTextFileHandler
public interface IPlaneTextFileHandler
Interface IPlaneTextFileHandler

Defines the contract for classes that handle reading from and writing to plain text files in the EISC Uno application. Implementations of this interface can be used for storing logs, configuration files, or any other text-based data.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String[]
    read(String filename)
    Reads all lines from the specified plain text file.
    void
    write(String filename, String content)
    Writes the specified content to a plain text file.

  • Method Details

    • write

      void write(String filename, String content) throws IOException
      Writes the specified content to a plain text file.
      Parameters:
      filename - the name or path of the file where the content will be written.
      content - the String data to be written into the file.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while writing to the file.

    • read

      String[] read(String filename)
      Reads all lines from the specified plain text file.
      Parameters:
      filename - the name or path of the file to read.
      Returns:
      an array of String objects, where each element represents one line of the file's content. Returns null if the file could not be read or was not found.
